column4: What will be the location of my CD/DVD drive, which I can select with "cd" command?
see what autocompletes. that should be your cd drive
i tried, but cd /media/cd{TAB} didn't work.
yeah, i tried that way, nothing completed automatically.
yeah, I got the name of the DVD. Do I need to type the name instead of "cd"?
the name of the CD showing (by ls command) "Entertainment  SUPERBIT_DELUXE" so what will be the command now?
do I need to use media also, in case of pen drive?
yes, all removable media gets mounted under /media
